title: Process a Trust Account Transaction
description: A firm receives a settlement check on behalf of a client, which must be deposited into the client's trust account.

tasks.description: Receive the settlement check and identify the correct client matter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the check and the correct client ID.

tasks.description: Record the deposit into the specific client's ledger within the trust accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly records the deposit, ensuring it is not commingled with firm funds.

tasks.description: Notify the client that the funds have been received and are being held in trust.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal notification to the client.
